did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Gay and lesbian ephemera, including political buttons, posters, and postcards. Also, Gay Games memorabilia, 1994, including the women's marathon.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Gay and lesbian ephemera, including political buttons, posters, and postcards. Also, Gay Games memorabilia, 1994, including the women's marathon.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
